TaskDefinition.name: RestTaskCaller
TaskDefinition.Description: Task template for rest task call.

Argument.helpKey: choose a user account which is used to connect remote servers.
Argument.name: user

Argument.helpKey: input the name of server 1. Example: http://servername:port#/iiqhome or https://servername:port#/iiqhome
Argument.name: server1

Argument.helpKey: select a task name to be launched on server 1.
Argument.name: task1

Argument.helpKey: input the name of server 2. Example: http://servername:port#/iiqhome or https://servername:port#/iiqhome
Argument.name: server2

Argument.helpKey: select a task name to be launched on server 2.
Argument.name: task2

Argument.name: server3

Argument.name: server4
